Address.value: 2801 DIODE LANE,HANGAR C 2ND FLOOR, LOUISVILLE, Kentucky, 40299, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: LogicMark Inc provides personal emergency response systems (PERS), health communications devices, and IoT technologies to create a connected care platform. Its devices give people the ability to receive care at home and confidence to age in place. The company incorporates two-way voice communication technology directly into its medical alert pendant and provides this life-saving technology at a price point that everyday consumers can afford.
